title: Anyone play ss13?

embed.description: Stream Honk Honk Butt by StephanosRex from desktop or your mobile device

body: Just wondering, if so, what servers you play/stories/characters?

replies.body: Bunch of people put on a space station, given jobs, a few are selected as antagonists. A ridiculous amount of things can happen. It's open source and is being developed by the community with a bunch of main codebases. One round, almost nothing will seemingly happen, another the entire station might be getting slaughtered for whatever reason. Good game, it's not very repetitive. It's ENTIRELY player driven.
